## WebjsContext.extractNumericValueFromStyle() method

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
extractNumericValueFromStyle(style: string): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  style | string | The style to parse, e.g. <code>'18px'</code> |

<b>Returns:</b>

number

Numeric value in CSS pixels.
